content: अनुगमः --मनं {@--1@} Following; आत्मानुगमनेन गां प्रसादयितुमर्हसि <ls>R. 1. 88</ls>; बृहतेर्धातोरर्थानुगमात् <ls>Ś. B.</ls> {@--2@} Comprehending, grasping (as a sense); रसाद्यनुगतः <ls>S. D.</ls> {@--3@} Following in death, post-cremation, self-immolation of a widow on her husband's funeral pile. {@--4@} Imitating; approaching. {@--5@} Conformity, accordance; श्रुत्यनुगमाच्च <ls>Ś. B.</ls>
